name: biomni-enumerate-bacterial-cfu-by-serial-dilution
title: Biomni: Enumerate Bacterial CFU By Serial Dilution
description: Quantify bacterial concentration (CFU/mL) using serial dilutions and spot plating
content:
Overview

Performs bacterial enumeration using the serial dilution and spot plating method, a fundamental microbiological technique for determining viable cell concentrations. This tool calculates Colony Forming Units per milliliter (CFU/mL) across multiple dilutions, identifies the optimal countable range (30-300 colonies), and provides statistical analysis of replicate measurements. The method is widely accepted as the gold standard for quantifying viable bacterial populations.

Input Parameters

  • initial_sample_volume_ml (optional, default: 1.0): Volume of the original sample in milliliters
  • estimated_concentration (optional, default: 1e8): Estimated bacterial concentration to guide dilution series design
  • dilution_factor (optional, default: 10): The factor by which each successive dilution differs (typically 10-fold)
  • num_dilutions (optional, default: 8): Number of serial dilution steps to perform
  • spots_per_dilution (optional, default: 3): Number of replicate spots per dilution for statistical accuracy
  • output_file (optional, default: 'cfu_enumeration_results.csv'): Name of the output CSV file

Biological Use Case

Fundamental technique for microbiology research including:

  • Bacterial growth curve construction and kinetics analysis
  • Antimicrobial efficacy testing and time-kill studies
  • Quality control in pharmaceutical and food microbiology
  • Fermentation process monitoring and optimization
  • Environmental microbiology and water quality assessment
  • Probiotic product validation and shelf-life testing
  • Bacteriophage titer determination

Output

Provides comprehensive enumeration results including:

  • CFU/mL calculation for each dilution level
  • Mean CFU/mL with standard deviation across replicates
  • Identification of optimal countable dilutions
  • Complete dilution series table in CSV format
  • Statistical analysis of replicate variability
  • Recommendations for dilution optimization
  • Summary report (cfu_enumeration_results.txt)

Category

microbiology
